semantic_title: Coding Guidelines for Personal History of COVID-19
section_path: Section I > C. Chapter-Specific Coding Guidelines > 1. Chapter 1: Certain Infectious and Parasitic Diseases > g. Coronavirus infections > 1. COVID-19 infections > i. Personal history of COVID-19

content.full_text: For patients with a history of COVID-19, assign code Z86.16, Personal history of COVID-19. (Evidence: pg no: 31, L37-L39)
content.summary: Specifies the code assignment for patients with a documented history of COVID-19 infection (Evidence: pg no: 31, L37-L39)

detailed_rules.explanation: When a patient has a documented history of COVID-19 infection, assign the specific personal history code Z86.16 (Evidence: pg no: 31, L37-L39)

incorrect_coding.rationale: U07.1 is for active COVID-19, not history
